NeedDef.label: Blood
NeedDef.description: Tracks the blood points of an organism. Regains at a rate of 1 per day. When the bar is empty, the organism will die.

NeedDef.label: Thirst for Vitae
NeedDef.description: One tasting of vampiric vitae is never enough, and now this individual needs to regularly consume vampiric blood to avoid violent withdrawal symptoms.
